name: gettimezone
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool reverse_geocoding_and_geolocation_service.
Tool description: Find nearest or largest city information or timezone for any given point location (latitude/longitude). The reverse geocode API back "reverse" codes any GPS location point into nearest or largest readable places with county, city, distance and population.
API description: Finds the local timezone for any given geo-location point by lat and long and returns timezone information with Timezone name, Timezone id and current local time.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude coordinate of the location.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude coordinate of the location.
